languages.text:
The Overseer chooses an unconscious familiar in their line of sight within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its maximum wounds and returns to combat.
Can be used on other Overseers' familiars, and only if the corresponding Overseer is alive.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an unconscious familiar in their line of sight within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its maximum wounds and returns to combat.
Can be used on other Overseers' familiars, and only if the corresponding Overseer is alive.

languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} familiar in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and returns to combat.
Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}потерявшего сознание{/g} фамильяра в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} в радиусе 5 клеток. Фамильяр восстанавливает {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} и возвращается в бой.
Может также применяться к фамильярам других надзирателей, находящихся в сознании.

Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.

traits.locale_text:
Надзиратель выбирает потерявшего сознание фамильяра в зоне видимости в радиусе 5 клеток. Фамильяр восстанавливает {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% от своего максимального здоровья и возвращается в бой.
Может также применяться к фамильярам других надзирателей, находящихся в сознании.

Надзиратель выбирает потерявшего сознание фамильяра в зоне видимости в радиусе 5 клеток. Фамильяр восстанавливает {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% от своего максимального здоровья и возвращается в бой.
Может также применяться к фамильярам других надзирателей, находящихся в сознании.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt in einem Radius von 5 Feldern einen {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlosen{/g} Vertrauten in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} aus. Dieser Vertraute regeneriert daraufhin {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} und kehrt in den Kampf zurück.
Kann auch auf Vertraute anderer Aufseher angewandt werden, die noch im Kampf sind.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} familiar in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and returns to combat.
Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.

traits.locale_text:
Der Aufseher wählt in einem Radius von 5 Feldern einen bewusstlosen Vertrauten in seiner Sichtlinie aus. Dieser Vertraute regeneriert daraufhin {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} % seiner maximalen Wunden und kehrt in den Kampf zurück.
Kann auch auf Vertraute anderer Aufseher angewandt werden, die noch im Kampf sind.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne un familier {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconscient{/g} dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} et dans un rayon de 5 cases. Ce familier récupère {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} et reprend le combat.
Peut également être utilisé sur les familiers d'autres surveillants encore au combat.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} familiar in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and returns to combat.
Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant sélectionne un familier inconscient dans sa ligne de mire et dans un rayon de 5 cases. Ce familier récupère {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} % de ses blessures maximums et reprend le combat.
Peut également être utilisé sur les familiers d'autres surveillants encore au combat.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内距离不超过5格的{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}使仆，为该名使仆恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}%，使其重新投入战斗。
战斗期间，此能力可用在其他监察官的使仆身上。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} familiar in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and returns to combat.
Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.

traits.locale_text:
监察官选择视线范围内距离不超过5格的昏迷使仆，为该名使仆恢复最大生命值的{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}%，使其重新投入战斗。
战斗期间，此能力可用在其他监察官的使仆身上。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} elige un familiar {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g} en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} en un radio de 5 casillas. El familiar recupera un {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} y vuelve al combate.
Se puede usar con los familiares de otros supervisores que siguen en combate.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} familiar in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and returns to combat.
Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.

traits.locale_text:
El supervisor elige un familiar inconsciente en su línea de visión en un radio de 5 casillas. El familiar recupera un {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} % de sus heridas máximas y vuelve al combate.
Se puede usar con los familiares de otros supervisores que siguen en combate.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}は半径5セルの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中にいる{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}のファミリアーを選択する。そのファミリアーはその{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}%を回復し、戦闘に復帰する。
戦闘に残っている他の監督官のファミリアーにも使用できる。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} familiar in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and returns to combat.
Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.

traits.locale_text:
監督官は半径5セルの視線の中にいる意識不明のファミリアーを選択する。そのファミリアーはその最大の傷の{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}%を回復し、戦闘に復帰する。
戦闘に残っている他の監督官のファミリアーにも使用できる。

監督官は半径5セルの視線の中にいる意識不明のファミリアーを選択する。そのファミリアーはその最大の傷の{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}%を回復し、戦闘に復帰する。
戦闘に残っている他の監督官のファミリアーにも使用できる。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde ve {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} bir iyeyi seçer. O iye, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} kadarını geri kazanır ve çatışmaya döner.
Hâlâ çatışmada bulunan diğer Gözetmenlerin iyeleri üzerinde de kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} chooses an {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} familiar in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} within a 5-cell radius. That familiar regains {uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162}% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} and returns to combat.
Can also be used on familiars of other Overseers still in combat.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde ve {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} bir iyeyi seçer. O iye, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} kadarını geri kazanır ve çatışmaya döner.
Hâlâ çatışmada bulunan diğer Gözetmenlerin iyeleri üzerinde de kullanılabilir.

Gözetmen, 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde ve görüş hattında bulunan baygın bir iyeyi seçer. O iye, maksimum sağlık puanının %{uip|Heal|0cded06c29174502823f0f52154d8162} kadarını geri kazanır ve çatışmaya döner.
Hâlâ çatışmada bulunan diğer Gözetmenlerin iyeleri üzerinde de kullanılabilir.
